attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Judges will be replaced with Funkmaster generals who will describe the accused funky or not funky. They will also wear disco attire that was popular in the 1970s/1980s and other things like backing singers will be avaliable at the accused/funkmaster generals request

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
